  • Constructor Details

    • PiratesEffectState

      public PiratesEffectState(Card pirates, PiratesLosingState piratesLosingState, ArrayList<Player> effectedPlayers, ArrayList<Shot> shots, int dice, int currentShot) throws Exception
      Constructor for the PiratesEffectState class.
      Parameters:
      pirates - The Card object representing the pirate card that triggers this state.
      piratesLosingState - The PiratesLosingState object representing the state when players have to defend against shots.
      effectedPlayers - The list of players affected by the pirates' attack.
      shots - The list of shots fired by the pirates.
      dice - The result of the dice roll determining the impact of the shots.
      currentShot - The index of the current shot being processed.
      Throws:
      Exception - If any error occurs during the initialization of the state.

  • Method Details

    • Continue

      public void Continue(FlightBoard flightBoard) throws Exception
      Executes the continuation logic for the current Pirate effect state. This method updates the state of the card and transitions to the next state if all players have responded.
      Overrides:
      Continue in class Card_State
      Parameters:
      flightBoard - the current flight board on which the game state is managed
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during state transition or card state update

    • activate

      public void activate(FlightBoard flightBoard)
      Activates the pirates effect state on the given flight board.
      Overrides:
      activate in class PiratesState
      Parameters:
      flightBoard - the flight board on which the pirates effect state is activated

    • chooseHowToFaceMeteors

      public void chooseHowToFaceMeteors(Player player, ArrayList<Integer> howToDefenceFromShots, FlightBoard fb) throws Exception
      Determines how a specific player should respond to meteors by analyzing their defense strategy and their ship's current state. Updates the game state accordingly, including handling improper inputs or invalid actions.
      Overrides:
      chooseHowToFaceMeteors in class Card_State
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is deciding how to face the meteors
      howToDefenceFromShots - a list of integers detailing the player's defense strategy against the shots
      fb - the flight board associated with the game and the player's ship
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during game state transitions or if inputs are invalid

    • getNextState

      public Card_State getNextState()
      Retrieves the next state of the card.
      Specified by:
      getNextState in class PiratesState
      Returns:
      the next Card_State of the card, based on its current state.
